```{r}
setwd("~/GitHub/master")
require(survival)
data <- read.table("survivaltable.txt",header = T)
sex <- as.factor(data$sex)
race <- as.factor(data$race)
age <- data$age
entry <- data$entry
far <- data$far
X=list(sex,race,age,entry,far    )

```
